1602993600.title: Bloomberg Daybreak: Middle East
1602993600.descr: Take a look at all the latest news in business, finance and where the markets are headed in this show that focuses on macro issues with a Middle Eastern context. The programme is broadcast from Dubai and hosted by Yousef Gamal El-Din and Manus Cranny.

1602997200.title: Bloomberg Studio 1.0
1602997200.descr: The movers and shakers of the world of high tech industries are interviewed, discussed and analysed in this insightful look at the major player in the technological revolutions as they happen. From face-to-face interviews to detailed breakdowns of the mechanisms both behind and in operation, the programme explores the currents shaping the ever changing world we live in.

1602999000.title: The David Rubenstein Show: Peer to Peer Conversations
1602999000.descr: Follow financier and philanthropist David Rubenstein as he travels around the US to interview some notable people, his peers, in order to find out what makes them such good leaders and so successful. He will talk to some of the most influential people in business and politics, hearing their life stories and how they became people thay are today.

1603000800.title: Coronavirus: Downturn Damage Control
1603000800.descr: Leading figures in business and finance discuss the impact of the coronavirus pandemic, and how they plan to limit the long-term damage to their companies, industries and portfolios.

1603002600.title: Art+Technology
1603002600.descr: Captivating documentary series that follows various talented artists from around the world that make art with the help from technology. Technology is changing the way we make, experience and share our ideas, and viewers will have a chance to see how some artist use it to make incredible art, thus creating a completely new genre.

1603004400.title: The David Rubenstein Show: Peer to Peer Conversations
1603004400.descr: Follow financier and philanthropist David Rubenstein as he travels around the US to interview some notable people, his peers, in order to find out what makes them such good leaders and so successful. He will talk to some of the most influential people in business and politics, hearing their life stories and how they became people thay are today.

From face-to-face interviews to detailed breakdowns of the mechanisms both behind and in operation, the programme explores the currents shaping the ever changing world we live in.

1603008000.title: Bloomberg Wall Street Week
1603008000.descr: Join David Westin as he dissects the latest stories and movements from Wall Street, inviting informed guests and financial experts to provide their thoughts and analysis regarding the market. He examines the impact that the current environment is having on businesses and traders, whilst looking ahead to peruse the likely changes across the financial industry.

1603011600.title: At the Top
1603011600.descr: Breitling CEO Georges Kern. We bring you conversations with the leading minds in global business. Find out what it takes to get to the top with Breitling CEO Georges Kern.

1603013400.title: At the Top
1603013400.descr: Sebastien Bazin, Accor Group, CEO. They are the largest European hotel group and a global heavyweight. Sebastien Bazin, the CEO of Accor Group, joins us At The Top in Dubai.

1603015200.title: At the Top
1603015200.descr: Kim Fornais, Saxo Bank, CEO & Founder. Saxo Bank serves clients in over 170 countries and processes over a million transactions a day. CEO and Founder Kim Fournais joins us in Dubai.

1603036800.title: EVs: on the Brink of Change
1603036800.descr: Electric vehicles are expected to explode as a more dominant means of mobility in the near future. Bloomberg's Alix Steel explores topics such as market demand, technology and infrastructure.

1603040400.title: Red Chip Money Report
1603040400.descr: Red Chip Money Report features interviews with CEOs from top public and private small-cap companies and news about emerging red chip stocks.

1603058400.title: Bloomberg Daybreak: Australia
1603058400.descr: Take a look at all the news, biggest stories, important information, business analysis and more from the Australia, New Zealand, Asia and other markets around the world. Join hosts Haidi Lun Stroud-Watts in Sydney, Shery Ahn in New York and Sophie Kamaruddin in Hong Kong, who will tell you everything you need to know.

1603062000.title: Bloomberg Daybreak: Asia
1603062000.descr: Programme that provides viewers with all the important global business and financial information they need as U.S. markets close and Asian markets open. The show airs live from Sydney, New York and Hong Kong with hosts Haidi Lun Stroud-Watts, Shery Ahn and Sophie Kamaruddin.

1603069200.title: Bloomberg Markets: China Open
1603069200.descr: The definitive guide to the markets in Hong Kong and on the mainland. Rishaad Salamat, David Ingles, Tom Mackenzie and Yvonne Man bring you the latest analysis to get you ready for the trading day.

1603072800.title: Bloomberg Markets: Asia
1603072800.descr: Find out all the latest news, important information, interesting stories and business trends from markets in Asia. The show is hosted by various anchors such as David Ingles, Yvonne Man, Rishaad Salamat and Haslinda Amin.
